content: शूना [श्वि अधिकरणे --क्त संप्र0 दीर्घः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} The soft palate, uvula. {@--2@} A slaughter house in general. {@--3@} Anything (such as a piece of household furniture), whereby life is likely to be destroyed; (these are five; a fire place, a grind-stone, a broom, a mortar, and a water-pot; पंच शूना गृहस्थस्य चुल्ली पेषण्युपस्करः . कंडनी चोदकुंभश्च वध्यते यास्तु वाहयन् <ls>Ms. 3. 68.</ls>)
